resources.string: Hi, my name is BLG and I am a real loser, I am good at nothing.\nI go to sleep late.\nI mostly waste my time chasing an impossible dream: working as a developer!
Nothing, nothing and more nothing. Maybe a bit of Linux? Who knows...

I have wasted my life away doing a lot of useless stuff some of which you can find in my GitHub account.

1. The idiotic London Tube Departure Board (LOL!)

2.The pathethic collection of Terraform stuff!

3.It all amounts to a big pile of nothing!
Don\'t waste you time trying to contact me. Why would you do that anyway?
